intensive.title: Intensive Training
intensive.description: Ideal for those who want to push their limits and improve their physical endurance while strengthening their body.

strength.title: Strength Gain
strength.description: A program designed to increase your muscular power and help you lift heavier weights.

sculpting.title: Body Sculpting
sculpting.description: For those who want to refine their silhouette by developing toned and well-defined muscles.

conditioning.title: Physical Conditioning
conditioning.description: A complete workout to improve your general fitness and strengthen your muscles in a balanced way.

muscular.title: Muscle Development
muscular.description: To maximize muscle growth while maintaining a low body fat percentage.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: Combine a muscle strengthening program with a suitable nutritional plan to optimize your gains and accelerate your recovery.

toning.title: Muscle Toning
toning.description: Perfect for firming muscles and getting a more sculpted body without adding too much volume.

endurance.title: Endurance and Resistance
endurance.description: Improve your muscular endurance to last longer and recover faster.

screenshots.title: OUR APP
screenshots.subtitle: Discover the intuitive interface of our app

featured.text: Very satisfied with the app! It allows me to organize my sessions and give instant feedback to my clients. Progress tracking is precise and motivating for them, it's an excellent tool for my practice.

reviews.elodie: The app is great! It's easy to use and the programs are very well detailed. I particularly appreciate being able to track my progress over time and receive motivating notifications.
reviews.antoine: Great experience with this app! It allows me to stay motivated and follow my sessions in a structured way. Regular reminders are very useful to never miss a session.
reviews.sarah: The app is very well designed and intuitive. It allows me to easily track my clients' progress and adapt their workouts in real time. I love the simple and clear interface.
reviews.lucas: The app is well designed, with exercises adapted to my level. I particularly appreciate the functionality to ask questions to my coach directly through the app.
reviews.isabelle: Practical app. I love being able to see my results, and the interface is very smooth. It's an excellent way to stay engaged in my workouts, especially with my coach's advice.
